No matter

the topic,

he always

ends up talking

about

insects and plants.

Oh! There’s an octopus!

Sure is!

After finding octopi

on the island of St. Jago

in the Cape Verde Islands, Darwin made repeated observations of their attributes.

Wow, it tries

to escape while freely moving and changing all parts of its body.

I bet if we

cooked it, it would

taste delicious!

Now where do you think you're
going!

Splaat!

What’s

this?

Ha ha!
